title.rendered: Wells Fargo employees volunteer to build bikes for children

content.rendered: It was a day of teamwork and purpose as Wells Fargo volunteers participated in an employee engagement program organized by Smile Foundation – the ‘Build a Bike Challenge.’ Working in teams, the volunteers collaborated, supported each other, and carefully assembled bicycles, knowing they were creating something meaningful for children who walk long distances to school. The children joined in too, watching, learning, and helping. And when the bikes were ready, their smiles said it all.
